items.descrText: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Binding.

explicitMods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.

explicitMods:
Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will cause
it to be used when certain conditions are met
Replaces any existing enchantment
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it.

explicitMods:
Adds a Grand Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Reforges a map item as another of the same tier
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it.

explicitMods: Randomises the values of the random modifiers on an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic, rare or unique item to apply it.

explicitMods: Randomises the values of the implicit modifiers of an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click another item to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges the number of sockets on an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more sockets.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a map
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a map to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity maps. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of an armour
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity armours. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Creates a portal to town
items.descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Identifies an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a flask
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity flasks. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Harbinger's Orb.

explicitMods: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.

explicitMods: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Magic items can have up to two random modifiers.

explicitMods:
Adds a Greater Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a Strongbox
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a Strongbox to apply it. Has greater effect on lower rarity Strongboxes. The maximum quality is 20%.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Horizons.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a weapon
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a weapon to apply it. Has greater effect on lower-rarity weapons. The maximum quality is 20%.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Chaos Orb.
A stack of 20 shards becomes a Regal Orb.

explicitMods: Removes all modifiers from an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.

explicitMods:
Removes one Influenced Modifier from an item with at least two Influenced
Modifiers and upgrades another Influenced Modifier
Upgrading a modifier of the highest tier transforms the
modifier into an Elevated Modifier
Attempting to upgrade an Elevated Modifier rerolls its values
Can be used on Body Armours, Boots, Gloves and Helmets
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an item with at least two Influenced Modifiers to apply it.

explicitMods:
Destroys an item, applying its influence to another of the same item class
The second item is reforged as a rare item with both influence types and new modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item, then left click the item you wish to take the influence from, then left click an item of the same item class you wish to apply it to.

explicitMods: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click an item to corrupt it. Corrupted items cannot be modified again.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

explicitMods:
Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will improve it
but prevent it from gaining charges during its effect
Replaces any existing enchantment
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges the links between sockets on an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a socketed item to apply it. The item's quality increases the chances of obtaining more links.

explicitMods: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Current modifiers are retained and a new one is added.

explicitMods:
Unpredictably raise the strength of one Searing Exarch or Eater of Worlds modifier on an item and lower the strength of another
Lesser modifiers that have their strength lowered will be removed
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a non-unique item to apply it. Can only be used on items that have both a Searing Exarch and an Eater of Worlds implicit modifier. The chance of raising or lowering a modifier depends on its relative strength.

explicitMods:
Adds a Lesser Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.

explicitMods: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.

explicitMods:
Adds an Exceptional Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Grants an atlas passive skill refund point
items.descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Grants a passive skill refund point
items.descrText: Right click on this item to use it.

explicitMods: Improves the quality of a gem
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a gem to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.

explicitMods:
Adds a Grand Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Searing Exarch implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.

explicitMods: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a corrupted socketed item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration.
A stack of 5 fragments becomes a Scroll of Wisdom.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Ancient Orb.

explicitMods: Removes a random modifier from an item
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges a unique equipment as another of the same item class
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a unique item to apply it.
A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Annulment.

explicitMods:
Adds a Lesser Searing Exarch implicit modifier to
a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet
This replaces any existing implicit modifiers other than Eater of Worlds implicit modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal, magic or rare item to apply it. Cannot be used on Shaper, Elder or Elderslayer influenced items.
